are we able to access HubDB data inside of email template modules?

I'm not sure. My first thought is, no. However, maybe there is a way via API?

Maybe someone else knows?
You can access blog loop from within an email so I would assume that YES you could. You would just have to test it.
Don't think the API would help. Email templates compile on send staticly.

Was there a recent change to the way embedded forms are structured?

i.e. adding a new `<div data-reactid=".hbspt-forms-0.0">` that wraps each `div.hs-form-field`?
yes there was. it broke a few of my forms styling
You can use HUBL tho.
filter and loop.
yeah, same boat here.
For sure, wasn't saying it couldn't be done, just that the API probably wouldn't be a good fit
:+1: thanks guys!
